PyKeOps
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PyKeOps installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PyKeOps, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PyKeOps/2.0-foss-2021a-CUDA-11.3.1
```
